&& NpcDialogueSend == false

item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

exactly what mine looks like =\

[code]public void Case40(int ID) {
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[ID];

			if (/*p.NpcDialogue == 1 ||*/p.NpcDialogue == 59 || p.NpcDialogue == 60 || p.NpcDialogue == 61 || p.NpcDialogue == 62 || p.NpcDialogue == 63 || p.NpcDialogue == 64 || p.NpcDialogue == 65 || p.NpcDialogue == 66 || p.NpcDialogue == 67 || p.NpcDialogue == 68 || p.NpcDialogue == 69 || p.NpcDialogue == 71 || p.NpcDialogue == 73 || p.NpcDialogue == 74 || p.NpcDialogue == 76 || p.NpcDialogue == 77 || p.NpcDialogue == 79 || p.NpcDialogue == 80 || p.NpcDialogue == 81 || p.NpcDialogue == 82 || p.NpcDialogue == 83 || p.NpcDialogue == 84 || p.NpcDialogue == 85 || p.NpcDialogue == 86 || p.NpcDialogue == 88 || p.NpcDialogue == 89 || p.NpcDialogue == 90 || p.NpcDialogue == 91 || p.NpcDialogue == 92 || p.NpcDialogue == 93 || p.NpcDialogue == 94 || p.NpcDialogue == 96 || p.NpcDialogue == 98 || p.NpcDialogue == 99 || p.NpcDialogue == 100 || p.NpcDialogue == 101 || p.NpcDialogue == 102 || p.NpcDialogue == 103 || p.NpcDialogue == 104 || p.NpcDialogue == 105 || p.NpcDialogue == 107 || p.NpcDialogue == 109 || p.NpcDialogue == 110 || p.NpcDialogue == 111 || p.NpcDialogue == 112 || p.NpcDialogue == 113) {
				p.NpcDialogue += 1;
				p.NpcDialogueSend = false;
			} else if (/*p.NpcDialogue == 1 ||*/p.NpcDialogue == 108 || p.NpcDialogue == 106 || p.NpcDialogue == 97 || p.NpcDialogue == 95 || p.NpcDialogue == 87 || p.NpcDialogue == 78 || p.NpcDialogue == 75 || p.NpcDialogue == 72 || p.NpcDialogue == 70) {
				p.NpcDialogue = 0;
				p.NpcDialogueSend = false;
				p.RemoveAllWindows();
			}

}

public void NpcChat(int NpcDialogue, int ID) {
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[ID];

	switch (NpcDialogue) {

dialogs here…

item.title: Everything fixed no further help needed
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

i was looking at a cooks assistant quest on google
i add its dialog handler and added doric’s quest to it.
but it will only show one dialog and then exit out?
does anyone know whats wrong?

heres some other things…

if (NpcDialogue > 0 && NpcDialogueSend == false) { server.dialogueHandler.NpcChat(NpcDialogue,playerId); UpdateNPCChat(); }

case 40: if (NpcDialogue == 1) { server.dialogueHandler.Case40(playerId); NpcDialogue += 1; NpcDialogueSend = false; } else if (NpcDialogue == 6 ) { server.dialogueHandler.Case40(playerId); NpcDialogue = 0; NpcDialogueSend = false; RemoveAllWindows(); }

[code]public void Case40(int ID) {
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[ID];

			if (/*p.NpcDialogue == 1 ||*/p.NpcDialogue == 59 || p.NpcDialogue == 60 || p.NpcDialogue == 61 || p.NpcDialogue == 62 || p.NpcDialogue == 63 || p.NpcDialogue == 64 || p.NpcDialogue == 65 || p.NpcDialogue == 66 || p.NpcDialogue == 67 || p.NpcDialogue == 68 || p.NpcDialogue == 69 || p.NpcDialogue == 71 || p.NpcDialogue == 73 || p.NpcDialogue == 74 || p.NpcDialogue == 76 || p.NpcDialogue == 77 || p.NpcDialogue == 79 || p.NpcDialogue == 80 || p.NpcDialogue == 81 || p.NpcDialogue == 82 || p.NpcDialogue == 83 || p.NpcDialogue == 84 || p.NpcDialogue == 85 || p.NpcDialogue == 86 || p.NpcDialogue == 88 || p.NpcDialogue == 89 || p.NpcDialogue == 90 || p.NpcDialogue == 91 || p.NpcDialogue == 92 || p.NpcDialogue == 93 || p.NpcDialogue == 94 || p.NpcDialogue == 96 || p.NpcDialogue == 98 || p.NpcDialogue == 99 || p.NpcDialogue == 100 || p.NpcDialogue == 101 || p.NpcDialogue == 102 || p.NpcDialogue == 103 || p.NpcDialogue == 104 || p.NpcDialogue == 105 || p.NpcDialogue == 107 || p.NpcDialogue == 109 || p.NpcDialogue == 110 || p.NpcDialogue == 111 || p.NpcDialogue == 112 || p.NpcDialogue == 113) {
				p.NpcDialogue += 1;
				p.NpcDialogueSend = false;
			} else if (/*p.NpcDialogue == 1 ||*/p.NpcDialogue == 108 || p.NpcDialogue == 106 || p.NpcDialogue == 97 || p.NpcDialogue == 95 || p.NpcDialogue == 87 || p.NpcDialogue == 78 || p.NpcDialogue == 75 || p.NpcDialogue == 72 || p.NpcDialogue == 70) {
				p.NpcDialogue = 0;
				p.NpcDialogueSend = false;
				p.RemoveAllWindows();
			}

}

public void NpcChat(int NpcDialogue, int ID) {
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[ID];

	switch (NpcDialogue) {

dialogs here…
